pages.title: Fisheomancy Altar
pages.text: Conjure items using fishe paste and a catalyst. All recipes are shapeless except for the catalyst which needs to go in the center.

pages.title: Special Interactions
pages.text: Hopper inputs insert to various slots.$(li)Top inserts catalyst alone$(li)Side inserts fishe paste or ingredients.$(li)Output only outputs finished item$(br)Redstone signals will craft but not $(l:fishe:fisheomancy/fishe_staff_entry)construct the multiblock$(/l)
